about_the_game:
Welcome to Gassy Getaway - the hilarious casual game that will put your laughter and time management skills to the test!

Navigate Through Office Chaos


In this frantic office adventure, you take on the role of an employee in a highly urgent situation - a pressing need that just can't be stopped! But beware: Your character unfortunately has limited control over their gases and must navigate through the office without hitting too many colleagues with their unwanted emissions.

Complete Tasks Before the Countdown


Your mission? Complete all the important tasks assigned to you in the office before you just can't hold it anymore and urgently need to visit the restroom! Whether it's quickly printing out an important document or locking the computer - withstand the time pressure and avoid embarrassing encounters on the way to relief.

Key Features:


  • Unique Gameplay: Navigate through the office and complete important tasks while trying to keep your flatulence under control.
  • Exciting Challenges: From simple to tricky tasks waiting to be completed before you just can't hold it anymore.
  • Hilarious Animations: Dive into a world full of funny animations and characters that will tickle your funny bone.
  • Office Environment: Explore various office areas with different obstacles and hiding spots as you make your way to the restroom.
  • Rewards and Leaderboards: Unlock achievements and compete for the top spot on leaderboards as you showcase your skills in flatulence management.
  • Customization Options: Customize your character with different outfits and accessories, getting ready for the wild adventure in the office!

With these features, Gassy Getaway is sure to provide an unforgettable experience for all players looking for a humorous and entertaining pastime!

name: Gassy Getaway

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD R3-1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Gassy Getaway is a hilarious office escapade where urgent tasks collide with uncontrollable flatulence! Maneuver through the chaos, complete assignments, and avoid embarrassing encounters with colleagues before dashing to the restroom. Can you keep it together in this laugh-out-loud challenge?
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
